content.description:
Pliny and His Villa

Reliqua pars lateris huius servorum libertorumque 
usibus detinetur, quamquam multa cubicula tam mundamundus, -a, -um, adj.: elegant 
ut accipere hospites possint. Ex alio latere cubiculum est
politissimumpolitus, -a, -um, adj.: decorated; deinde alium cubiculum magnum vel cenatiocenatio, -onis, f.: dining room.
content.question: In line 4, what does vel mean?

unit.text: 3: Pliny's Letters: Ghosts and Apparitions, Letters to Trajan and Calpurnia, and Teacher's Choice - Latin Prose

skill.text: 1.A: Identify the meaning of Latin words and phrases.
